dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3893084L] Report of copyright abuse
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Friday, April 27, 2007 8:50 AM To: alejandro.curiel@comhem.se Cc: DMCA Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3893084L] Report of copyright abuse Reference: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3893084L] copyright@theplanet.com is the clearinghouse for all copyright infringement reports. Your email is being sent to our legal counsel at the address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration. You may find their direct contact information at this URL: http://www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal.asp -- Regards, Abuse Department The Planet abuse@theplanet.com http://www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal.asp ==== Original Message ==== 1. Report of copyright abuse Added by system at Friday, Apr 27 2007 01:48 pm X-MailFrom: alejandro.curiel@comhem.se X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Fri Apr 27 13:47:00 2007 Received: (qmail 29096 invoked by alias); 27 Apr 2007 18:47:00 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 29093 invoked from network); 27 Apr 2007 18:47:00 -0000 Received: from unknown (HELO DALD2EXCH01.PLANET.LOCAL) (172.16.220.10) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 27 Apr 2007 18:47:00 -0000 Received: from Exchanger.ev1servers.net ([207.218.222.102]) by DALD2EXCH01.PLANET.LOCAL with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Fri, 27 Apr 2007 13:47:00 -0500 Received: from mailin.ev1servers.net ([207.218.222.124]) by Exchanger.ev1servers.net with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Fri, 27 Apr 2007 13:46:59 -0500 X-ASG-Debug-ID: 1177699614-5384-21-0 X-Barracuda-URL: http://207.218.222.124:8000/cgi-bin/mark.cgi X-ASG-Recipient-Whitelist: abuse@ev1servers.net Received: from ch-smtp01.sth.basefarm.net (ch-smtp01.sth.basefarm.net [80.76.149.212]) by mailin.ev1servers.net (Spam Firewall) with ESMTP id 627FA4B1D9 for ; Fri, 27 Apr 2007 13:46:59 -0500 (CDT) Received: from c83-250-107-48.bredband.comhem.se ([83.250.107.48]:3382 helo=alcupc) by ch-smtp01.sth.basefarm.net with esmtp (Exim 4.63) (envelope-from ) id 1HhVSt-0003nZ-4Z for abuse@ev1servers.net; Fri, 27 Apr 2007 20:46:43 +0200 Reply-To: From: "Alejandro Curiel" To: X-ASG-Orig-Subj: Report of copyright abuse Subject: Report of copyright abuse Date: Fri, 27 Apr 2007 20:46:25 +0200 Message-ID: <002b01c788fc$6615a860$6700a8c0@alcupc> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----=_NextPart_000_002C_01C7890D.299E7860" X-Mailer: Microsoft Office Outlook 11 thread-index: AceI/FuRc6MubFHSQgqXCFinajUGKg== X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.3028 X-Scan-Result: No virus found in message 1HhVSt-0003nZ-4Z. X-Scan-Signature: ch-smtp01.sth.basefarm.net 1HhVSt-0003nZ-4Z 62ffc596e050da872875d7fc2d20140b X-Virus-Scanned: by Barracuda Spam Firewall at ev1servers.net X-Barracuda-Spam-Score: 0.00 X-Barracuda-Spam-Status: No, SCORE=0.00 using global scores of TAG_LEVEL=4.0 QUARANTINE_LEVEL=1000.0 KILL_LEVEL=8.0 WHITELISTED Return-Path: alejandro.curiel@comhem.se X-OriginalArrivalTime: 27 Apr 2007 18:46:59.0909 (UTC) FILETIME=[70364750:01C788FC] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format.
